ModMetaData.name: Colonist Memorials
ModMetaData.author: Horologium
ModMetaData.description:
A man who dies, no matter how terrible his crime was, must be brought to burial.
-Ayman Odeh
This mod adds even more elegant memorials to store the bodies of your dead colonists. Give them a proper burial the others will never forget! You can research Memorials to make them. They take stone-like materials (or ores like steel/gold) and give off lots of joy while honoring the occupant.
